ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Medium Sizes
ygData.msgSnippet: Large Bronze drops in Najena, Small Bronze drops in MM and Lake Rathe, Medium Bronze drops in Permafrost. Darkforge is indeed the SK quest armor. Generally
ygData.messageBody:
Large Bronze drops in Najena, Small Bronze drops in MM and Lake Rathe,
Medium Bronze drops in Permafrost.

Darkforge is indeed the SK quest armor. Generally involves getting decayed
armor from cazic and some other pieces.

Dark Reaver is SK only, additionally I think it is 2h slash, but I won't
swear to that. Dunno about Painbringer. Without knowing what level your Sk
is I can't recommend a 1H slash to camp.

Draelon

-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher Andrews [mailto:cmandy_drew@...]
Sent: Monday, March 27, 2000 11:44 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Medium Sizes


From: "Christopher Andrews" <cmandy_drew@...>

My Musical Friends,
I've seen maybe two pieces of medium bronze EVER. =) Ok, so where does it
drop? Someone asked me last night, upon telling him i made a SHD, "Let's go
hunt in Najena." Does medium sized bronze drop there off <30 mobs? In
addition, I'd like to verify that SHD's do have class specific armor... is
it the Darkforge? If so, I'll just look it up on a eqshadowknights page or
something. No need to go into specifics, seeing this is a bard list.

One last thing... What's a good slasher i can camp for this poor little guy?
Dark Reaver is SHD only right? Is Pain Bringer WAR only? It sticks in my
mind as such... Well ok.. Thank you all in advance for your advice and help.
Look forward to seeing you on! =)

Pava Rahti <currently happy tagless>
Bard of 30 measures
Cazic Thule
